elements.description: Plays the specified animation on a Rive model
elements.name: play_anim

parameters.doc: The Rive model for which to play an animation
parameters.name: url

parameters.doc: Id of the animation to play
parameters.name: anim_id

parameters.doc: Playback mode of the animation (from go.PLAYBACK_*)
parameters.name: playback

parameters.doc: function to call when the animation has completed
parameters.name: complete_function

elements.description: Plays the specified animation on a Rive model
elements.name: play_state_machine

parameters.doc: The Rive model for which to play an animation
parameters.name: url

parameters.doc: Id of the state machine to play
parameters.name: state_machine_id

elements.description: Cancels all running animations on a specified spine model component
elements.name: cancel

parameters.doc: The Rive model for which to cancel the animation
parameters.name: url

elements.description: Returns the id of the game object that corresponds to a specified skeleton bone.
elements.name: get_go

info.description: Functions and constants for interacting with Rive models
info.name: rive
